b2.title: Identification of RIP1 kinase as a specific cellular target of necrostatins
b2.reason: This paper demonstrates RIPK1 kinase activity as the target of Nec-1 and the role of RIPK1 as a key mediator of necroptosis

b92.title: Activation of Necroptosis in Multiple Sclerosis
b92.reason: This paper provides the first insight into the involvement and mechanism of RIPK1-mediated necroptosis in MS and the role of necroptosis in mediating oligodendrocyte cell death
